itemDisplayName: Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) SOFS cluster using Managed Disks
description: This template creates Azure VMs on an existing VNET, and it provisions them as a Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) Scale-Out File Server (SOFS) cluster using managed disks.
summary: This template creates Azure VMs for a Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) cluster using managed disks on an existing Azure VNET and Active Directory domain.
